amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the $43,592,000 in funding for the 287(g) program and increase funding for the Office of Civil Rights and Civil Liberties account by $4,359,200 with the balance going to deficit reduction.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for the U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement Salaries and Expenses account by $43,592,000; strike funding for the 287(g) program; and increase funds for the Office of Civil Rights and Civil Liberties by $4,359,200.
